data.event: In 1787 the United States established the Northwest Territory, and in 1803 the southeastern portion of the Territory was admitted to the Union as part of the new state of Ohio.

event.title: 1803 the southeastern portion of the Territory was admitted

data.event: In 1787 the United States established the Northwest Territory, and in 1803 the southeastern portion of the Territory was admitted to the Union as part of the new state of Ohio.

event.title: was built there during the War of 1812

data.event: Fort Stephenson was built there during the War of 1812, and the Battle of Fort Stephenson was fought there in August 1813.
